instructions.step: Melt the butter in a large pan. Add the pancetta and whole garlic clove and cook for 5 minutes, or until the garlic turns brown. Remove and discard the garlic. Cook the pancetta for 5 minutes more.
Meanwhile, cook the  pasta in a large pan of salted, boiling water, until al dente. Drain, add to the pan with the pancetta  and toss, then take the  pan off the heat.
Add ½ the grated cheeses, season with black pepper, then pour in the eggs, mixing well immediately so that it coats the pasta. Add the remaining cheese, mix again, and serve at once.
